creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: tan coat with fish scale texture; asymmetrical closure at front; applique around collar; blue, red, and tan hems and cuffs; organic, curling applique on back
medium: Cloth: fish skin (Amur carp and Pacific salmon), sinew (reindeer), cotton thread; appliqué and embroidery
title: Woman’s fish-skin festival coat (hukht)
